trans-unit.source: Replace the cover of your system.

seg-source.mrk: Replace the cover of your system.

target.mrk: Replace the cover of your system.

trans-unit.source: The cover needs to be put back on to reduce problems from dust.

seg-source.mrk: The cover needs to be put back on to reduce problems from dust.

target.mrk: The cover needs to be put back on to reduce problems from dust.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the computer's cover from its safe place. Put it back on.

seg-source.mrk: Retrieve the computer's cover from its safe place.

target.mrk: Retrieve the computer's cover from its safe place.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the screws from the safe place. Put them back in.

seg-source.mrk: Retrieve the screws from the safe place.

target.mrk: Retrieve the screws from the safe place.

trans-unit.source: Put away your screwdriver before you lose it.

seg-source.mrk: Put away your screwdriver before you lose it.

target.mrk: Put away your screwdriver before you lose it.
